text: @MichaelSteele @KenJone56612075 DOJ barr wants to suspend Constitutional Rights all the time 24/7 for years & he thinks he can use covid19 as an excuse. Reminds me of ex-Speaker Ryan’s lifelong ambition to destroy Social Security & Medicare/Medicaid. What is wrong with @GOP brains/hearts? Structurally deformed!
